None.Name: Elemental Balls
None.Description: Every 4 seconds, unit hurls an elemental ball that deals 112 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 168 in total. Knocks back small, medium and large units.

None.Name: Blessed Radiance
None.Description: Upon dying the unit will release its elemental powers and infuse them into its environment. Up to 4 hostile units within a 20m radius will be frozen for 20 seconds. After freeze wears off, targets are immune against Freeze for 10 seconds.
